Knowing this hell we'll soon be over once he reverses the magic and if he works hard on this Wiccan stuff maybe he can even get his revenge on whoever would dare do something like this to him.

She returns with some new clothes and he tries them on. They're all at least a size 18, he doesn't even second guess her. Resigining himself to being even bigger than the chubby salegirl. He appreciates her help and doesn't mention how feminine the clothes make him look. In some outfits, from the right angle he might even pass for a woman. With his long hair from the backside he definitely looks like one. He's been noticing he hasn't had to shave in weeks, but wearing these outfits he'll have to watch himself as he knows it might raise a few eyebrows from people who don't already know him. They move to the cash register after he's accumulated several bags of clothes, almost enough to max out the gift card.
155121111121121111211222111111111.title: She Brings Him The Pants He Desires

info.brief_description: Magic and sci-fi transformations that go awry, sometimes for the best, often for the worst
info.description: The changes that I'll focus on are weight gain, tg, transfers and ones involving role reversal. I'd prefer the gains to be somewhat realistic and for the transformees to not end up much bigger than 300lbs (250 is ideal). I'd like to avoid anthro or furry transformations if possible, pretty much everything else should be cool though.
